body: Is there any reason for the change in the staff's rank colors?
body_tagged: Is there any reason for the change in the staff's rank colors?
title: New rank colors...

replies.body:
Not really.
But you don't want the same thing forever do you?
Change is good.
It's a nice refresher.
replies.body_tagged:
Not really.
But you don't want the same thing forever do you?
Change is good.
It's a nice refresher.

replies.body: I've seen people saying congratz to peachy a lot of times since they thought he got promoted. xD
replies.body_tagged: I've seen people saying congratz to peachy a lot of times since they thought he got promoted. xD

replies.body:
^ xD 

Administrators I believe are Managers and Directors in one, which is a big job.

Izjust and tel have been demoted to Sr Moderator, although I reckon it was their own decision to be demoted because I don't think the staff team would want izjust and tel to not be Administrators.
replies.body_tagged:
^ xD 

Administrators I believe are Managers and Directors in one, which is a big job.

Izjust and tel have been demoted to Sr Moderator, although I reckon it was their own decision to be demoted because I don't think the staff team would want izjust and tel to not be Administrators.

replies.body: No, Administrators are just directors. We removed the Manager rank because there was no difference in permissions/power between Senior Moderators and Managers. Therefore, we merged Managers with Senior Mods.
replies.body_tagged: No, Administrators are just directors. We removed the Manager rank because there was no difference in permissions/power between Senior Moderators and Managers. Therefore, we merged Managers with Senior Mods.

replies.body: I personally like the new rank colors.  Except the Mod color, I like the blue more.  But that is just me.
replies.body_tagged: I personally like the new rank colors.  Except the Mod color, I like the blue more.  But that is just me.

replies.body: I like all the new rank colors, and I also noticed the Gold rank in-game is a little more "yellow" than before.
replies.body_tagged: I like all the new rank colors, and I also noticed the Gold rank in-game is a little more "yellow" than before.

replies.body:
IMO These should be the colors:

Map dev: Purple
Jr Mod: Green
Mod:  Lime Green
Sr Mod: Dark Red, almost like the "Denied" color for the contest maps :P
Administrator: Black xdddd, No, Aqua

replies.body: I think the in-game gold should go back to what it was before... Now it's yellow, and I wanna feel special with the gold color.
